alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 10:24AM EST until February 19 at 11:15AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Chemung County in central New York... Southern Tioga County in central New York... Southeastern Steuben County in central New York... Northwestern Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 1115 AM EST. * At 1023 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Erin to near Lawrenceville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Elmira, Southport, Barton, Big Flats, Horseheads, Sayre, Waverly, Elmira Heights and Owego. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 48 and 65. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
